S

search(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.SearchController
search This method will take provided conditions based on any combination of table number, dates and times intervals or ordered food to find the matched orders and populate these orders into the TableView searchResult.
SearchController - Class in application
This class is the controller of the order list search screen for manager: Search.fxml and for staff: StaffSearch.fxml Can search the orders based on table number, dates and times intervals and ordered food.
SearchController() - Constructor for class application.SearchController
 
searchItem(String) - Static method in class application.SQLiteConnection
searchItem This method retrieves the time of the orders containing selected item in the database.
searchTable(int) - Static method in class application.SQLiteConnection
searchTable This method retrieves the time of the orders of selected table in the database.
searchTableItem(int, String) - Static method in class application.SQLiteConnection
searchTableItem This method retrieves the time of the orders of selected table containing selected item in the database.

SQLiteConnection - Class in application
This class contains all methods that communicate with the database and a connection method.
SQLiteConnection() - Constructor for class application.SQLiteConnection
 
Staff - Class in application
This class creates the type Staff for TableView staffTable in edit staff account screen: EditStaff.fxml.
Staff(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class application.Staff
 
StaffController - Class in application
This class is the controller of the edit staff screen: EditStaff.fxml.
StaffController() - Constructor for class application.StaffController
 
staffList(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.MainController
staffList Switch the screen to EditStaff.fxml (Add, Remove or Modify staff accounts) for manager.
stafflogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.LoginController
stafflogin Check the given user name and password combination with the record in database, if right, log the staff in and switch the screen to StaffIn.fxml.
StaffLogin(String, String) - Method in class application.SQLiteConnection
StaffLogin This method checks if the provided staff login information is correct.
staffOrderList(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.MainController
staffOrderList Switch the screen to StaffSearch.fxml (Search order list) for general staffs.
start(Stage) - Method in class application.Main
start Initialise the first screen with Login.fxml, provides two ways to login to the app: General staff login and Manager login, they will lead you to different screens.
StringTo - Class in application
This class gives a method to convert a time string into a Timestamp.
StringTo() - Constructor for class application.StringTo
 
submit(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.MainController
submit Submit current order into the database.
